item.title: JS 面向对象
item.description:
Contents
  • 1. base
    • 1.1. JS 面向对象
    • 1.2. 弹框页面

1. base

1.1. JS 面向对象

  1. js

$(function(){
	function T(){
		//this.a = 'a';
		_this = this;
		//初始化
		this.init();
	};
	T.prototype = {
	    init: function(){
	        $('*[data-jump]').each(function(){
		        $(this).bind('click',{flag:$(this)},_this.jump);
	        });
	        $('*[data-modify]').each(function(){
		        $(this).bind('click',{flag:$(this)},_this.modify);
	        });
	    },
		save: function(event){
			var data = event.data.flag;
			console.log(data.html());
		},
		modify: function(event){
			var data = event.data.flag;
			var id = data.attr('data-id');
			var flag = data.attr('data-modify');

			switch(flag)
			{
				case 'edit':
					window.location.href = '/mgf/toModify.do?id='+id;
				  break;
				case 'delete':
					window.location.href = '/mgf/delete.do?id='+id;
				  break;
			}
		},
		jump: function(event){
          var data = event.data.flag;
          window.location.href = '/mgf/to-insert.do';
        }
	};
	window["t"] = new T();
});

  1. html

//导入文件
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/orderManager.js" />

1.2. 弹框页面
